content.prompt: As outlined in the second paragraph, the changes in Rabuka’s political rhetoric between 1987 and 1997 were most likely a result of which of the following?

choices.label: The proliferation of ethnic and religious conflicts following the collapse of communism
The spread of democratization and economic globalization in the modern world
The discrediting of Social Darwinism and other racial “scientific” theories
The outsourcing of Western industrial production to developing economies in the Asia-Pacific region

topic.text: 9.9: Continuity and Change in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
